title: Minecraft 基岩版 1.14.0.12 发布（仅PS4）
author: zyjking
txt_content:
本帖最后由 zyjking 于 2019-12-14 20:21 编辑 

Minecraft基岩版是指包括Minecraft手机版（Android、IOS）、Win10版（VR）、主机版（XboxOne、NS、PS4）在内，使用“基岩引擎”（C++语言）开发的Minecraft统一版本。
正式版是Minecraft基岩版经过一段时间的测试版测试之后得到的稳定版本，也是众多材质、Addon和官方领域服会逐渐跟进的版本。与此同时Google Play、Win10 Store等官方软件商店也会推送此次更新。
https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/360037910991

NOTE: This hotfix is currently only available only on PlayStation 4 (Version 2.00) and many of the fixes will reach other platforms in another hotfix soon.
注意：此补丁仅在PS4上可用（游戏版本2.0.0），其它平台的修复将在不久后推送另一个补丁

Fixes:
bug修复

修复了17个bug

Crashes / Performance崩溃/性能
Fixed several crashes that could occur during gameplay修复了游玩时可能发生的崩溃问题Fixed several crashes that could occur when converting a world from PlayStation 4 Edition (MCPE-58594)修复了无法将旧PS4版本的存档转换为新基岩版存档的问题Fixed a crash that could occur when signing into a Microsoft Account修复了无法登录微软账号的问题Fixed a crash that could occur in the trial version when performing an action that would unlock a trophy修复了试用版解锁奖杯时发生的崩溃问题Having many Editions worlds no longer increases startup time优化其它版本的存档加载速度

General常规
Fixed the error that would occur when pressing the 'Unlock Full Game' button in the trial version修复试用版中点击“解锁完整版”发生的崩溃问题Fixed the 'Error Number 0' account error that occurred on the main menu and Store修复了在主页面和商店页面发生的“错误代码0”的账号问题（XX-XXXXX-0）

Gameplay游玩
View bobbing once again behaves correctly when facing North and South (MCPE-56214)面向正南或正北时的视角摇动动画正常了Shulker Boxes with items are no longer missing from chests after converting a world from PlayStation 4 Edition (MCPE-58465)转换PS4版本存档不会再导致潜影盒消失和丢东西了Fixed world conversion enabling cheats on Survival worlds (MCPE-58499)修复了转换PS4生存模式的存档会开启作弊的问题Fixed some trophies unlocking for all players during a multiplayer session修复了多人游玩时会自动解锁奖杯的问题

Mobs怪物
Bees will now die after attacking (MCPE-53860)蜜蜂蜇人后会去世了

Graphical图形界面
Fixed broken textures appearing after Resource Packs are deactivated修复禁用材质包后材质仍不正常的问题Fixed some Character Creator items appearing incorrectly修复某些角色创建器的东西显示不正常的问题

User Interface用户界面
Fixed an issue that caused some players not to be able to leave the Inventory screen on the Marketplace修复一些玩家无法退出市场的个人物品界面的问题Fixes to Character Creator screens when scrolling with the right thumbstick修复了PS4手柄右摇杆无法上下滚动角色创建器的问题Fixed placeholder text appearing on the Resource Packs and Behavior Packs screens调整材质包和行为包界面的占位符文本位置
